projects.title: Residential Building Design Project
projects.description: Complete structural design and analysis of a 15-story residential complex including foundation design, beam-column analysis, and seismic considerations. The project involved detailed architectural planning and structural optimization.
highlights: Performed seismic analysis and wind load calculations
Optimized structural elements for cost efficiency

projects.title: Highway Pavement Design
projects.description: Design and analysis of flexible pavement for a 25km highway section following IRC guidelines. Included comprehensive soil testing, traffic analysis, and pavement thickness design with consideration for local climate conditions.
highlights: Conducted extensive soil testing and analysis
Designed pavement layers per IRC standards

projects.title: Bridge Construction Model
projects.description: 3D modeling and structural analysis of a 200m span cable-stayed bridge including dynamic analysis, construction sequencing, and detailed connection design. The project emphasized innovative construction techniques and sustainability.

projects.title: Water Supply & Drainage System
projects.description: Comprehensive design of water supply and stormwater drainage system for a residential township covering 500 acres. Included hydraulic analysis, pipe network design, and treatment plant specifications.
highlights: Integrated GIS mapping for asset management
